fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Wiretap a player during the night.
- Copy a player's last will during the day. 3 Uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you wiretap a player, you will be given all notifications given to them from then on.
- When you copy a player's last will, you will be able to read it yourself.
- You will be notified if any whispers to and from you are eavesdropped or interfered with; when this happens, you may choose to edit what the contents of the whisper appears to be to the eavesdropper.
